This is a merger between two or more companies engaged in unrelated business activities. The firms may operate in different industries or in different geographical regions.

options: The purchase of one business enterprise by another;

The type of merger when both the entities loses its existence

question: What is the meaning of ‘merger’?
options: Any combination of two or more business enterprises into a single enterprise.
A holder or owner of shares, especially in a company or corporation.
The purchase of one business enterprise by another
